name: WKAudioFileAsset
desc: An object that stores a reference to an audio file and provides metadata information about that file.  DeprecatedUse the AVFoundation frameworkâ€™s AVPlayer and AVQueuePlayer classes instead.

items.name: init(url: URL)
items.desc: Returns an asset for the audio file at the specified URL.

items.name: init(url: URL, title: String?, albumTitle: String?, artist: String?)
items.desc: Returns an audio file asset and sets the metadata for that item.

items.name: var url: URL
items.desc: The URL of the audio file.

items.name: var duration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The duration (in seconds) of the audio file.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: The title information for the audio file.

items.name: var albumTitle: String?
items.desc: The album title information for the audio file.

items.name: var artist: String?
items.desc: The artist information for the audio file.
